name: Death Domain
description: Clerics of the Death Domain embody necromantic power and ruthless inevitability, draining life and commanding the dead. This domain is often used for villainous clerics but is official.

1.name: Death Domain Spells
1.description: You always have certain spells prepared at specific cleric levels.

1.name: Reaper
1.description: You can target an additional creature with certain necromancy cantrips.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Touch of Death
2.description: You can add a large amount of necrotic damage to a melee attack.

8.name: Divine Strike
8.description: Once on each of your turns when you hit with a weapon attack, you deal extra necrotic damage.

17.name: Improved Reaper
17.description: Your Reaper feature improves, letting you affect stronger necromancy spells.
